Name: Crossbow
Ingredients: 20 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange juice and chocolate powder rim &/or orange zest twist.
Review: Surprisingly dry, chocolate and orange laced with gin.
History: Originally a 3-equal parts cocktail, we discovered in 2005 at Bar Opiume, Singapore.
Nutrition: One serving of Crossbow contains 201 calories
